releaseNotes.title: November 2024 Release
releaseNotes.summary: Here's what's new in this release:

features.title: Maintenance Reminders now available for Lite Devices
features.descriptions: Now any connected machine, including those with Lite Telemetry, can send maintenance reminders when a threshold for cleaning hours is met. Users can also export a CSV report of maintenance reminders.

features.title: Release Notes viewable in the Iris portal
features.descriptions: When there is an update to the portal, a notification will show in the menu. Click the question mark icon to navigate to the What's New tab to view details of the release.

features.title: Alert Notification Enhancement
features.descriptions: Unread or new alert notifications are now indicated by a red dot for improved visibility.

features.title: Fixes Provided
features.descriptions:
1. We fixed an issue where some sub-groups saw a blank Battery page without data. Those users can now see their data in the Battery page.
  2. We fixed an issue where Cleaning Hourmeter for some machines was not updating.
